plot: The Mint is a live interactive gameshow filled with a feast of games and entertainment. Celebrity guests will drop by the Mint to chat and play along with the games.
plot_en: The Mint is a live interactive gameshow filled with a feast of games and entertainment. Celebrity guests will drop by the Mint to chat and play along with the games.
plot_es: The Mint is a live interactive gameshow filled with a feast of games and entertainment. Celebrity guests will drop by the Mint to chat and play along with the games.
title: The Mint
